'''Rezanov''' is a quest-exclusive NPC that appears in the {{Quest|Past and Future}}.

==Profile==
<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->
Rezanov appears in [[Capitano]]'s hideout and informs him that [[Mavuika]] is weakened, and it would be a good opportunity to seize the gnosis from her, even if Capitano is injured.

He's seen in the background when Capitano speaks with [[Ororon]] in one of Ororon's flashbacks.

===Appearance===
<!--Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 2 paragraphs with 3-4 sentences each.-->
Rezanov wears the standard, male Fatui uniform and has brown, short hair.  His skintone is pale.

==Trivia ==

* Rezanov, may be inspired by {{Lang|{{w|Nikolai Rezanov}}|ru=Николай Резанов|ru_rm={{#invoke:ru-rm|main|Николай Резанов}}}}, a Russian nobleman and statesman, promoted the project of Russian colonization of Alaska and California.
